name: Escapees (Arihan10)
description:
It's an average Tuesday night and you find yourself escaping a high-tech military facility. 

But wait, you're not alone! As you move forward, more and more prisoners start following you. Stay safe solider... 

Controls are explained in game and tutorial is provided. Have fun! 

KNOWN BUGS: 

  • The end game screen doesn't work, so yes, the game ends at Level 5
  • Getting caught while hacking doesn't close the hacking window
